items.title: Enhanced Member Management
items.description: See member roles and permissions clearly with new role indicators and detailed member information.

items.title: Smart Permission System
items.description: Better control over who can edit, delete, and share your lists with granular permission settings.

items.title: Improved Member List
items.description: Clickable sharing status, member avatars, and cleaner member display throughout the app.

items.title: Better User Experience
items.description: Streamlined UI with permission-based buttons and improved navigation flow.
